name: Horse Simulator 2015
description:
Do you like horses? If you like horses, this game is for you.
You need to show the way our horse lost in the magical forest. But forest filled with obstacles, and you should not go astray. You must collect the shoe and straw in front of you.

You must be prepared against the ghost will come out later.

Horse Simulator 3D Features

Realistic 3D graphics
Realistic sounds
Realistic controls
Bonus chapters
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
